data.title: Dadasaheb Phalke Awards 2024 complete winners list: Shah Rukh Khan, Bobby Deol and others win big
meta_keywords: Dadasaheb Phalke Awards 2024 complete winners list
data.meta_description: The Dadasaheb Phalke Awards 2024 is happening today in Mumbai. This year Shah Rukh Khan, Bobby Deol, Nayanthara and others have bagged the top honours.
data.text:
The Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival Awards is the most prestigious awards ceremony. Television and Bollywood stars eagerly wait for this day to arrive. They have all worked hard this year and given some hit movies and hit TV shows. It has been an amazing year for the entertainment industry. The Dadasaheb Phalke Awards 2024 is happening today in Mumbai. The event is taking place in Mumbai's Taj Lands End where all the Bollywood and TV celebrities have arrived to celebrate the successful year and the amazing performances.

For all the TV News and Entertainment News updates, follow BollywoodLife on WhatsApp.

Many celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan, Bobby Deol, Nayanthara, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Sunil Grover, Aditya Roy Kapur, Anil Kapoor, Shahid Kapoor, Vikrant Massey, Atlee and others arrived in style. Now, all of you guys must be waiting to know the names of the winners.

Dadasaheb Phalke Awards 2024 complete winners list

Well, we have the complete list of winners here. Yes, this year Bobby Deol, Shah Rukh Khan, Nayanthara and others have grabbed the top honours. Take a look at the Dadasaheb Phalke Awards 2024 complete winners list here:

BEST FILM- Jawan

BEST ACTOR - Shah Rukh Khan (Jawan)

BEST ACTRESS - Rani Mukerji (Mrs. Chatterjee vs Norway)

BEST DIRECTOR - Sandeep Reddy Vanga (Animal)

BEST CINEMATOGRAPHER - Gnana Shekar V. S. (IB71)

CRITICS BEST FILM - 12th Fail

CRITICS BEST ACTOR - Vicky Kaushal (Sam Bahadur)

CRITICS BEST ACTRESS - Kareena Kapoor Khan (Jaane Jaan)

CRITICS BEST DIRECTOR - Atlee Kumar (Jawan)

BEST ACTOR IN A SUPPORTING ROLE - Anil Kapoor (Animal)

BEST ACTOR IN A NEGATIVE ROLE - Bobby Deol (Animal)

BEST ACTOR IN A COMIC ROLE - Ayushmann Khurranna (Dream Girl 2)

BEST ACTRESS IN A COMIC ROLE - Sanya Malhotra (Kathal)

MOST VERSATILE ACTRESS OF THE YEAR - Nayanthara

MOST PROMISING ACTOR - Vikrant Massey (12th Fail)

MOST PROMISING ACTRESS - Adah Sharma (The Kerala Story)

BEST INTERNATIONAL FEATURE FILM - Oppenheimer

BEST WEB SERIES - Farzi

BEST ACTOR IN A WEB SERIES - Shahid Kapoor (Farzi)

BEST ACTRESS IN A WEB SERIES - Sushmita Sen (Aarya Season 3)

CRITICS BEST WEB SERIES - The Railway Men

CRITICS BEST ACTOR IN A WEB SERIES - Aditya Roy Kapur (The Night Manager)

CRITICS BEST ACTRESS IN A WEB SERIES - Karishma Tanna (Scoop)

BEST SHORT FILM - Good Morning

BEST MUSIC DIRECTOR - Anirudh Ravichander (Jawan)

BEST PLAYBACK SINGER - MALE - Varun Jain ( Tere Vaaste - Zara Hatke Zara Bachke)

BEST PLAYBACK SINGER - FEMALE - Shilpa Rao (Besharam Rang - Pathaan)

OUTSTANDING CONTRIBUTION IN MUSIC INDUSTRY - K.J. Yesudas

OUTSTANDING CONTRIBUTION IN FILM INDUSTRY - Moushumi Chatterjee

TELEVISION SERIES OF THE YEAR - Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin

BEST ACTOR IN A TELEVISION SERIES - Neil Bhatt (Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin)

BEST ACTRESS IN A TELEVISION SERIES - Rupali Ganguly (Anupamaa)

Shah Rukh Khan had an amazing year. In 2023, three of his films released and all of them were big hits. Pathaan, Jawan and Dunki received all the love and Shah Rukh Khan was amazing in all of them. He has received the Best Actor award for his performance in Jawan.

Jawan is a big hit and even Nayanthara got the best actress award for it. Talking about Bobby Deol, he was just brilliant in Animal. He played the role of Abrar and he has become the most loved villain of Bollywood now. He truly deserves this honour for his performance in the Ranbir Kapoor movie.

Congratulations to the winners!
